name: Genever Tasting With Foodpairing
description: Genever is the authentic Dutch spirit since the 17th century, and knows many different forms and traditions. Our bartender will explain your guests about the history and craftsmanship behind the Bols Genevers and will introduce you to the differences between Bols Genever, Bols Jonge & oude Jenever and Bols Corenwyn.
